description: KeePass Commander is a plugin for the KeePass password store. It's purpose is to provide a communication channel for php-scripts, bat-files, powershell, python, C#, git, ... to be able to query the KeePass password store from the commandline without configuration and without password

installer.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Copy-Item "$dir\Kee*" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\"; KeePass

uninstaller.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Get-Item "$dir\Kee*" | Foreach-Object { Remove-Item $( $_.FullName -replace [regex]::Escape($dir), "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins" ) -Force }; KeePass
